SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dbi_income (five_fifteen, fifteen_thirty, thirty_fifty, fifty_hundred, hundred_two, two_five, Five_above, date) values (#{fiveFifteen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fifteenThirty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirtyFifty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fiftyHundred,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hundredTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twoFive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fiveAbove,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update dbi_income set five_fifteen = #{fiveFifteen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fifteen_thirty = #{fifteenThirty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thirty_fifty = #{thirtyFifty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fifty_hundred = #{fiftyHundred,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hundred_two = #{hundredTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, two_five = #{twoFive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Five_above = #{fiveAbove,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, five_fifteen, fifteen_thirty, thirty_fifty, fifty_hundred, hundred_two, two_five, Five_above, date from dbi_income where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, five_fifteen, fifteen_thirty, thirty_fifty, fifty_hundred, hundred_two, two_five, Five_above, date from dbi_income

select id, five_fifteen, fifteen_thirty, thirty_fifty, fifty_hundred, hundred_two, two_five, Five_above, date from dbi_income
and date like concat("%",#{date},"%")
